#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
       int t;
      cin>>t;
      while(t--)
      {
 
       int n,sum=0;
       cin>>n;
       while(n--)
       {
        long long int a,d;
         cin>>d;
         cin>>a;
         while(a>=0)
         {
             sum+=a;
             a-=d;
         }
       }
       if(sum%2==1)
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
       else
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
      }
 
return 0;
}
